casebody.data:
Wendy WILSON, Individually and as Next of Kin and Personal Representative of Ryan Wilson, Deceased, petitioner,
v.
CITY OF LAFAYETTE, COLORADO, et al. No. 12-1451. Supreme Court of the United States Oct. 7, 2013.

Case below, 510 Fed.Appx. 775 .

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Tenth Circuit denied.
